[++EXP Codes codes++]

00000000 00DA875B

D9000000 00000000
C0000000 000000C3
D6000000 00000000
DC000000 FFFFFFFC
DC000000 00000074
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Leave oasis and return to update resident experience.\n\nOnly your current party members will update their level.}

[++Movement Cheats++]

[L = High Jump]
605DAFA8 00000000
B05DAFA8 00000000
DFFFFFFE 00000001
DD000000 00000300
D2000000 00000001
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000200
D9000000 00000024
D4000000 40400000
D6000000 00000024
DC00000F FFFFFFFC
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000202
D9000000 00000024
D4000000 40400000
D6000000 00000024
D0000000 00000000
DFFFFFFE 00000000
D0000000 00000000
{ENTERING SOME LOCATIONS TOO EARLY CAN BREAK STORY PROGRESSION FLAGS\n\nOnly affects player character\n\nHold L to slow descent. L+B Adds more height/starts jump on flat land\n\nL+R allows aiming with Crossbows on slopes\n\nDirection can't be changed in mid air, but momentum is kept}

[B = Disable Wall Collisions]
005DC47C 3F8020C5
DD000000 00000002
005DC47C 00000000
D0000000 00000000
{ENTERING SOME LOCATIONS TOO EARLY CAN BREAK STORY PROGRESSION FLAGS\n\nHold B to pass through unclimbable walls\n\nKeep holding B to keep effect after dodge roll ends\n\nEffect applies to all characters (and enemies, lol)}

[--]
